name: Five Ingredient Salad Dressing – Our New Favorite

name: Maple-glazed pan-roasted Brussels sprouts with chestnuts

freshly ground black pepper to taste

name: Spicy Seasoning Salt
ingredientsWAmounts: 1 teaspoon dried serrano pepper powder or 2 + teaspoons if you want more heat

ingredientsWAmounts: 8 large Idaho or other large russet potatoes, about 1 pound each

name: Rainbow Carrot, Taleggio & Hazelnut Tarte Tatin – A Holiday
ingredientsWAmounts: 500g rainbow or orange carrots, scrubbed and lightly peeled

name: Pastrami Waffles
